update.description:
** Ignore this pull request unless you're working on the foosball demo **

* Allows multiple players to move the rods.
* Allows a player to switch the rod by pressing the trigger button.
* You can specify in the world file the rods assigned to the left/right controller.
* You can specify in the world file `<oculus>1</oculus>` and if you're in the read team, you're controllers will be adjusted.

~~Review pull request #1572 before this one.~~
update.title: [DRC Expo: Foosball] Model plugin that controls the rods.

pullrequest.title: [DRC Expo: Foosball] Model plugin that controls the rods.

content.raw:
I renamed it to `<invert_control>`. In case this parameter is set, we invert the control and also swap left and right controllers.
As a bonus I fixed a normalization angle problem that we had before. d6da078
content.html: I renamed it to <invert_control>. In case this parameter is set, we invert the control and also swap left and right controllers. As a bonus I fixed a normalization angle problem that we had before. d6da078

content.raw:
Let think of a better name than <oculus> here:
Either something that explains that the hydra rotation is inverted <invert_hydra_rotation>, or that this particular player does not have a separate display <team_has_no_display> or <shares_other_team_monitor> or  better.
content.html: Let think of a better name than <oculus> here: Either something that explains that the hydra rotation is inverted <invert_hydra_rotation>, or that this particular player does not have a separate display <team_has_no_display> or <shares_other_team_monitor> or better.
